function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prolonged exposure to social harms in housing","Impact":"Poor health and well-being, increased risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Intervention to address social harms, improvement of housing conditions","Technologies":"Social intervention programs, housing improvement technologies","People":"People experiencing homelessness","Owner":"Social service providers, housing authorities"},{"Description":"Fluid and conflated spaces due to Covid-19 lockdowns","Impact":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases, blurring of boundaries between home and workplace","Mitigation":"Health guidelines for home and workplace, flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, health monitoring devices","People":"General population","Owner":"Employers, health authorities"},{"Description":"Inequality in housing and health","Impact":"Disparities in health outcomes, increased risk of contagious diseases for marginalized populations","Mitigation":"Equitable housing policies, improved access to healthcare","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying disparities, telemedicine","People":"Marginalized populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare providers"}]}
